alert.note: Alert for Eastern Ascension; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 1:50PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Ascension and northwestern St. James Parishes through 230 PM CDT... At 149 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sorrento, or 10 miles southeast of Gonzales. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Heavy rain and wind gusts of 20 to 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rain could lead to localized flooding. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gonzales and Sorrento. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 179 and 192. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
